author: oheger
msg: Reworked update and event handling for sub configurations.
The complicated mechanism to detect updates in sub configurations, propagate
them, and validate root nodes is no longer needed. This is all handled by
tracked nodes. Now a simple change listener is registered at connected sub
configurations which sends events of type EVENT_SUBNODE_CHANGED.

author: oheger
msg: Implemented sub configuration creation hooks in SubnodeConfiguration.
The configurationAt() methods now work correctly in SubnodeConfiguration.

author: oheger

author: oheger
msg: Added hooks for the creation of a sub configuration.
There are new protected methods for defining a sub configuration's parent model
